content: little drop of wonderful by ali debuc the little drop of wonderful is at heart a little bit of happiness make it stuff it squeeze it throw it slam it cuddle it give it away…there are so many options to bring a smile to your face or someone else s feeling sad cuddle it feeling friendly give it as a gift feeling stressed squeeeeeeze it hard feeling angry throw it at a wall just be sure you a haven t added plastic eyes first feeling creative make one in all the colours of the rainbow make it a hat then make yarn more… any yarn any weight just make sure you use the appropriate hook size to get a good tight gauge remember the lighter the weight the smaller the droplet for the samples above i used dark blue droplet 1 x 50g ball of rico creative cotton aran 85m and a 2 5mm hook pink droplet 15g of paintbox cotton dk 37 5m and a 2mm hook bright blue droplet 10g of schachenmayr catania 4ply cotton and a 1 5mm hook tools crochet hook size determined by your yarn and gauge crochet stitch markers lobster clasp or similar scrap yarn for marking stitches when working the main body darning needle for weaving in ends stuffing black yarn or thread to embroider the face safety eyes if using gauge gauge is not too important except to make sure you get good tight fabric pattern is written in us terminology ©ali debuc 2021 abbreviations single_crochet single_crochet increase work 2scs
